function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of how a system fails","Impact":"Failures may not be effectively mitigated, leading to disruptions in system function","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough analysis of failure modes and implement strategies to mitigate potential failures","Technologies":"Failure mode and effects analysis (FMEA), fault tree analysis (FTA), predictive maintenance technologies","People":"Engineers, system designers, and maintenance personnel","Owner":"Engineering teams and maintenance departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate resilience of infrastructure systems","Impact":"Disruptive events, such as natural disasters, may cause prolonged disruptions to infrastructure functionality","Mitigation":"Implement predictive, adaptive, and recovery strategies to enhance infrastructure resilience","Technologies":"Predictive analytics, adaptive control systems, rapid recovery technologies","People":"Infrastructure managers, emergency response teams, government agencies","Owner":"Infrastructure management organizations and government authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on interdependent network performance","Impact":"Failure to measure and manage interdependent network performance may lead to cascading failures and detrimental societal impacts","Mitigation":"Develop methods to quantify and manage the performance of interdependent network systems, considering both physical and societal impact","Technologies":"Interdependency modeling tools, network performance monitoring systems, impact assessment tools","People":"Network engineers, system analysts, and social impact analysts","Owner":"Organizations responsible for network infrastructure management"}]}
